item.title: Cold health alert as parts of UK set to freeze on Christmas Day
item.description: Organisers of some Christmas Day and Boxing Day swims have cancelled events due to the weather.

item.title: King's Christmas message urges communities to pull together in times of uncertainty
item.description: He invokes the wartime spirit in his annual speech, delivered from Westminster Abbey.

item.title: Waterskiing Santas and giant cuts of meat: Christmas around the world
item.description: From London to Bethlehem, services and festivities to mark the holiday cheer are in full swing.

item.title: Two men believed missing as coast search continues
item.description: Emergency services are responding to reports of people in trouble in the water off the Devon coast.

item.title: Robertson was 'the scruffy fat lad who conquered Europe twice'
item.description: Those who know him best look back on the illustrious career of John Robertson, Nottingham Forest's double European Cup winner.
